name: Almost Soccer
description:
Almost Soccer

Made for the "Stop Waiting for Godot Game Jam"

A game that plays almost like soccer.

Controls
  • WASD - Move player
  • Hold Shift - Sprint
  • Hold and Drag Left Mouse Button - Aim Ball
  • Release Left Mouse Button - Kick Ball
Tips
  • If the ball is outlined in red, you can aim and kick the ball.
  • Hold and drag away from where you want the ball to go.
